predicate.note: Frames file for 'neighbor' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: be next to

example.name: only one neighbor mentioned
example.text: As long as the rival Soviet-backed regime of Mengistu Haile Mariam held a total gridlock over neighboring Ethiopia, the U.S. was forced to accept that lonely Berbera runway as a distant No. 2 to the Soviets' array of airfields next door.

example.name: two neighbors
example.text: John's house neighbors the city dump.

roleset.note: The truly verbal form is very rare, but this is the second symmetric argument verb, after 'match'.
